text: Rogue Warfare is a 2019 film directed by Mike Gunther. The film stars Will Yun Lee, Jermaine Love and Rory Markham and is described as a multi-national, special forces action/drama. The project was written by Gunther, Andrew Emilio DeCesare and Michael Day and is intended as the first in a trilogy. ==Plot== Elite soldiers from around the world unite to fight a terrorist network. ==Cast== *Will Yun Lee as Daniel *Jermaine Love as Ralph *Rory Markham as James *Bertrand-Xavier Corbi as Jacques *Katie Keene as Galina *Fernando Chien as Xu *Chris Mulkey as Commander Brisco *Gina DeCesare as Officer Marino *Essam Ferris as Supreme Leader ==Production== Filming took place in Santa Clarita, California. ==Sequels== Two sequels were shot back to back with Rogue Warfare 2: The Hunt became available on demand from March 16 2020 and Rogue Warfare 3: Death of a Nation became available on demand from April 13 2020. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2019 films
title: Rogue Warfare
